headline: Jim Cramer Notes TJX Stock Drops Despite Strong Quarter
summary: The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) is one of the 14 stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. During the episode, Cramer made the following comments about The TJX Companies, Inc.
